infoArray.name: labelText
infoArray.desc: The label of the access point.

infoArray.name: hintText
infoArray.desc: The hint text of the label.

infoArray.name: isMultiSelection
infoArray.desc: If true, user can select multiple resource.

infoArray.name: errorText
infoArray.desc: The error content to display.

infoArray.name: UserMustBeSelected
infoArray.desc: If true, user must be select at least one user resource.

infoArray.name: WorkgroupMustBeSelected
infoArray.desc: If true, user must be select at least one work group resource.

infoArray.name: RoleMustBeSelected
infoArray.desc: If true, user must be select at least one role resource.

infoArray.name: selectable
infoArray.desc: If true, items can be select.

infoArray.name: expandAll
infoArray.desc: If true, all item will be expanded.

infoArray.name: height
infoArray.desc: Height of component.

infoArray.name: showIcons
infoArray.desc: If true, icons will be show.

infoArray.name: isOnlyLeafCheckable
infoArray.desc: If true, only leaf is checkable.

infoArray.name: isCheckable
infoArray.desc: If true, item will be checkable.

infoArray.name: caseSensitive
infoArray.desc: If true, search will be case sensetive.

infoArray.name: exactMatch
infoArray.desc: If true, search will be exact match.

infoArray.name: includeAncestors
infoArray.desc: If true, ancestors will be include.

infoArray.name: includeDescendants
infoArray.desc: If true, descendants will be include.

infoArray.name: getValue
infoArray.desc: Get the selected resource ids.

infoArray.name: resetValue
infoArray.desc: Clear the selected resource ids.

infoArray.name: onDialogClosed
infoArray.desc: Callback function fires when the user close the dialog.

infoArray.name: _clearActionButton
infoArray.desc: Clear the selected items.

infoArray.name: _openDialogActionButton
infoArray.desc: Open the access point on dialog.
